events.message: I received the smartphone I ordered last week, but the screen has several scratches and the touch is not working properly.
The reported problem has been identified as a product defect related to screen damage and functionality issues.
Your case has been assigned to one of our technical support agents for further assistance with the defective product.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issues with your smartphone. I’m here to help resolve this for you as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched screen and let us know if the touch issues occur all the time or intermittently?
I have attached the photos showing multiple scratches on the display. The touch screen freezes randomly and often does not respond at all.
Thank you for the photos and information. We will send you a replacement device immediately and provide a prepaid label to return the defective phone.
I appreciate the quick response and the offer to replace the device. Looking forward to receiving the new phone soon.
Your replacement smartphone has been shipped and the defective unit return process has been arranged as per your convenience.
We wanted to check if the replacement device is working well and if there’s anything else we can assist you with.
The new phone works perfectly, no scratches or any issues. Thanks for the excellent support!
We are closing your case now. Thank you for your patience and for choosing our service.
